original: Encrantz, Bernhard Gustaf Ericsson, jägmästare, Kalmar, f. 19/1/92 i Envikens förs., Kopparb. 1., av kontr:-prosten Anders Gustaf Ericsson o. Hedda Fahlcrantz. G. 17 m. Elna Fredriksson. Barn: Carl-Gustaf f. 18, trafikflyg, i ABA-SILA, löjtn. i flygv. res., Jan-Carl 20, med. lic., Elna-Britta 20, DSI, Margareta 26, stud. — Stud:ex. i Falun 10, utex. fr. skogsinst. h. kurs 16. Anst. i domänverket sed. 16, assist, i Pajala o. Tärendö revir 17, i Jukkasjärvi o. Vettasjoka 18,- und:lär. v. Koldeberga skogssk. 20, assist, i Linköp. o. Tjusts revir 35, jägmäst. i Gällivare revir 38 o. i Kalmar revir sed. 45. Distr :chef i bränslekomm. 17-18, ordf. i N. Åsbo härads soc:dem. kretsorg. 30-35, led. av styr. f. Skånes soc:dem. partidistr. 32-35, landstingsm. i Krist. 1. 36-38, hemv :omr :befälh. i Gällivare 40-44, ordf. i Norrb. hemv :omr :befälh. läns-förb. 42. Norrb. landst:förb. förtj:-SM.
translated: Encrantz, Bernhard Gustaf Ericsson, forest ranger, Kalmar, b. 19/1/92 in Enviken parish, Kopparberg county, son of the contract-provost Anders Gustaf Ericsson and Hedda Fahlcrantz. Married in 1917 to Elna Fredriksson. Children: Carl-Gustaf b. 1918, air traffic controller at ABA-SILA, reserve lieutenant in the Air Force, Jan-Carl b. 1920, a medical license holder, Elna-Britta b. 1920, DSI, Margareta b. 1926, student. Passed the student exam in Falun in 1910, graduated from the forestry institute higher course in 1916. Employed in the domain agency since 1916, assistant in the Pajala and Tärendö districts in 1917, in the Jukkasjärvi and Vettasjoka districts in 1918, underskogslärare at Koldeberga forestry school in 1920, assistant in the Linköping and Tjust districts in 1935, forest ranger in the Gällivare district in 1938 and in the Kalmar district since 1945. District chief in the fuel committee from 1917 to 1918, chairman of the N. Åsbo district social democratic organization from 1930 to 1935, member of the board of the Skåne social democratic party district from 1932 to 1935, county councilor in Krist. 1. from 1936 to 1938, home defense area commander in Gällivare from 1940 to 1944, chairman of the Norrbotten home defense area commander county association in 1942. Awarded Norrbotten county councilor medal of merit.
